content: ssk k3 *6 9+ k2tog k1 twist 4 sts decreased 14 20 26 sts work 1x1 rib for 1 5 *1 75 2 25+ inches size m and l round 10 k1 ssk k4 *7+ k2tog k2 ssk k4 *7+ k2tog k1 4 sts decreased 16 22 sts next round k5 *5 6+ m1 *k8 *10 11+ m1* three times k5 *5 7+ 4 sts increased 38 44 50 sts size l only k1 ssk k5 k2tog k2 ssk k5 k2tog k1 4 sts de- creased 20 sts hand cut working yarn leaving an 8 long tail and graft the re- round 1 k2 *3 5+ **c4f k8 c4b k2*3 5++ knit to the end maining stitches together using kitchener stitch of the round thumb round 2 4 6 knit carefully remove scrap yarn from the thumb stitches placing round 3 k4 *5 7+ **c4f k4 c4b k4*5 7++ knit to the end of live stitches on two needles there will be 4 *5 6+ stitches the round below the hole and 3 *4 5+ above round 5 k6 *7 9+ **c4f c4b k6*7 9++ knit to the end of the join yarn at the the thumb on back of the hand k4 *5 6+ round pick up 3 *3 4+ sts along the gap k3 *4 5+ pick up 3 *3 4+ sts repeat round 1-6 until the mitten measures 2 25 *2 5 2 75+ along the second gap 13 15 19 sts inches from the cuff ending on any round join in the round and knit until thumb measures 75 inches right mitten next round continuing the pattern as estab- shorter than desired length lished work to the end of the double brackets ** ++ then knit size s and l only k2tog knit to the end of the round 1 st the next 4 *5 6+ sts with the scrap yarn slide scrap yarn sts decreased 12 18 sts back to the left needle and knit them again with the work- ing yarn round 1 *k3 *3 4+ k2tog* three times 3 sts decreased 9 12 15 sts left mitten next round continuing the pattern as estab- lished work to the last 4 *5 6+ sts of the round then knit the round 2 *k1 *2 3+ k2tog* three times 3 sts decreased 6 9 next 4 *5 6+ sts with the scrap yarn slide scrap yarn sts back 12 sts to the left needle and knit them again with the working size s only *k2tog* three times 3 sts decreased 3 sts yarn size m and l *k1 *1 2+ k2tog* three times 3 sts decreased continue working rounds 1-6 as established until mitten is 6 9 sts about 1 5 *2 2 25+ inches short of desired length about 4 size m only *k2tog* three times 3 sts decreased 3 sts *5 5 5+ inches not including cuff trying to end on round 5 if not continue working the instructions in the double size
